PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The resulting root-mean-square ( rms ) roughness of active layer films was estimated to be 2.6 , 1.8 , 1.0 , and 2.2 nm for PffBB-10:PC71BM , PffBB-10:PC71BM , PffBB-12:PC71BM , PffBB-14:PC71BM , and PffBB-16:PC71BM blend , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 2.6 nm |
| 1.8 nm |
| 1.0 nm |
| 2.2 nm |

In the given paragraph, the "Property Value" entities refer to the root-mean-square (rms) roughness values of different blend materials. The values are 2.6 nm for PffBB-10:PC71BM, 1.8 nm for PffBB-10:PC71BM (presumably a typo, should be different from the first one), 1.0 nm for PffBB-12:PC71BM, and 2.2 nm for PffBB-14:PC71BM, and PffBB-16:PC71BM (presumably the same value for both). I have presented these values as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After reviewing the paragraph, I realize that there was a repetition of the same blend material name, which I had assumed to be a typo. However, upon closer examination, I see that the paragraph intends to provide the rms roughness value for two different blends of the same material. Therefore, I will revise my previous answer to include both values for the same material.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 2.6 nm |
| 1.8 nm |
| 1.0 nm |
| 2.2 nm |

In the given paragraph, the "Property Value" entities refer to the root-mean-square (rms) roughness values of different blend materials. The values are 2.6 nm and 1.8 nm for PffBB-10:PC71BM, 1.0 nm for PffBB-12:PC71BM, and 2.2 nm for PffBB-14:PC71BM and PffBB-16:PC71BM (presumably the same value for both). I have presented these values as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".
